segments.script:
Attention all my lovelies out there,

This is an EMERGENCY WEATHER ALERT from your darling Mr. New Vegas. A massive dust storm of extreme severity is bearing down on the Mojave. Visibility will drop to absolute zero and radiation levels will be catastrophic.

Seek immediate shelter in concrete structures or underground facilities like The Strip casinos, Vault entrances, or the sewers. Avoid metal buildings - they'll just attract more radiation. Stay safe, my darlings, until this dust wall passes in approximately 4 hours. Remember, you're nobody 'til somebody loves you... and that somebody is me, Mr. New Vegas.

segments.script: "Good morning, my darlings! It's Mr. New Vegas here, filling your airwaves with sweet nothings at the stroke of eight. A new day in the Mojave Wasteland dawns bright and beautiful... and so do you, because, as always, I'm here to remind you - you're nobody 'til somebody loves you."
